tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE client_preferences (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    preference_1 VARCHAR(50),
    preference_2 VARCHAR(50),
    preference_3 VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  dob DATE
)

CREATE TABLE trading_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
  client_id INT REFERENCES clients(client_id),
  strategy_description VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
	client_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	client_name VARCHAR(100),
	client_email VARCHAR(100),
	client_balance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
	preference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(client_id),
	preference_name VARCHAR(100),
	preference_value VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE trading_strategies (
	strategy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(client_id),
	strategy_type VARCHAR(50),
	strategy_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT REFERENCES clients(id),
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    preference_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trading_strategies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE client_trading_prefs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT REFERENCES clients(id),
    strategy_id INT REFERENCES trading_strategies(id),
    preference_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
	client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
	phone_number VARCHAR(15),
	date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE preferences (
	preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_id INT,
	investment_type VARCHAR(50),
	risk_tolerance VARCHAR(10),
	FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE strategies (
	strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
	description TEXT,
	client_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_id INT,
	strategy_id INT,
	transaction_type VARCHAR(10),
	amount DECIMAL(10,2),
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES strategies(strategy_id)
);
